arts.ttl: Man United, Tottenham dealt Angel Gomes transfer blow as 'talks' opened with 'frontrunners'
arts.sum: Manchester United and Tottenham Hotspur apparently suffer a blow in their pursuit of Lille's Angel Gomes, as another Premier League team leads the race for his signature.

arts.ttl: Red-hot Man Utd rumour opens up PERFECT chance for Jonathan David
arts.sum: Red-hot Man Utd rumour opens up PERFECT chance for Jonathan David Manchester United hold the key to opening the door for Canada ace Jonathan David to make his perfect move in the summer transfer window – but that would not be to Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Jonathan David transfer preference 'revealed' amid Man United, Arsenal, Barcelona interest
arts.sum: Jonathan David's transfer preference is allegedly revealed amid apparent interest from the likes of Arsenal, Manchester United and Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Jonathan David makes huge transfer decision amid Man United and Chelsea interest
arts.sum: Lille’s Jonathan David is at the centre of a heated transfer battle as top European clubs vie for his signature this summer – but it’s the Premier League he wants, CaughtOffside understands. The 25-year-old Canadian international, whose contract with Lille is set to expire in June, has been in great form this season, netting […] The post Exclusive: Jonathan David makes huge transfer decision amid Man United and Chelsea interest appeared first on CaughtOffside.
